CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Project_Site_Address_2__c), Project_Site_Address__c & ", " & Project_Site_City__c & ", " & Project_Site_State__c & " " & Project_Site_Zipcode__c, Project_Site_Address__c & ", " & Project_Site_Address_2__c & ", " & Project_Site_City__c & ", " & Project_Site_State__c & " " & Project_Site_Zipcode__c)
CustomField.label: Project Site Address Concat
